title: QUESTIONMAN2022
author: QUESTIONMAN2022
content: Hi everybody,I need to extract my TRANSACTION HISTORY (deposit and withdrawal history) from my Bitcoin core wallet.My Bitcoin core wallet has a few different Receiving Addresses.QUESTION:Apart from taking screenshots of my BITCOIN-CORE Desktop wallet from my computer screen, is there another method to obtain transaction history, using a .CSV file, but without damaging my Bitcoin core wallet?

comments.author: hosemary
comments.body: Quote from: QUESTIONMAN2022 on October 09, 2022, 09:34:38 AMApart from taking screenshots of my BITCOIN-CORE Desktop wallet from my computer screen, is there another method to obtain transaction history, using a .CSV file, but without damaging my Bitcoin core wallet?It's very easy to export your transactions history.Go to "Transactions" tab and click on "Export" button. It's located at bottom right corner of the window.

comments.author: QUESTIONMAN2022
comments.body: Quote from: hosseinimr93 on October 09, 2022, 09:56:53 AMQuote from: QUESTIONMAN2022 on October 09, 2022, 09:34:38 AMApart from taking screenshots of my BITCOIN-CORE Desktop wallet from my computer screen, is there another method to obtain transaction history, using a .CSV file, but without damaging my Bitcoin core wallet?It's very easy to export your transactions history.Go to "Transactions" tab and click on "Export" button. It's located at bottom right corner of the window.https://i.imgur.com/6LND4iz.jpgThanks. I'll give it a try
